Description: Job descriptionAl-Ghad College of Applied Medical Sciences Announces its need to appoint English language lecturerResponsibilities:-     Participate in the implementation of the college's vision and mission.-     Implementation of educational and training programs, each in relation to and according to the study plan and the prescribed academic quorum.-     Teaching the assigned courses according to the shares determined by the system.-     Carrying out practical exercises and lessons according to the shares prescribed by the system.-     Carrying out all the work related to the exams of the Teaching courses: (setting questions - correction - review and audit).-     To convey to students the latest developments in field of specialization.-     Participate in the development of college programs and work procedures.-     Participation in the work of departmental councils, committees, college activities, and scientific research programs.-     Attending department council sessions, participating in it, and voting on its decisions and recommendations.-     Carrying out the assigned works from the department council within the limits of the rules and regulations.-     Maintaining order in halls and laboratories.-     Carrying out all that entrusted to in the field of scientific research, academic advising, or other administrative or academic work, in addition to the prescribed teaching load.-     Contribute effectively to conducting scientific research in specialty.-     Carry out the required quality work and prepare the necessary reports for the academic courses.-     Fostering the spirit of constructive competition among students and encouraging innovation and creativity in order to achieve excellence for the college and its students.-     Participation in the committees of the department and the college.-     Making the necessary periodic reports required from the college or scientific departments.-     Preserving the reputation of the college and its property, maintaining order and the safety of students.-     Dedication to work in college.-     Compliance with all regulations, laws, bylaws, and instructions in force in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and not prejudice religion or interfere in politics.Skills
Skills: 1- Excellent English pronunciation, vocabulary and grammar skills.
2- Confidence and skills to give motivating and interesting lessons to students.
8- Keep up to date with the latest methods and theories for English teachers.
10- Get equipped to teach at the right level.
- Two years of experience (at least) in education or training For Applicants who have a Master's degree in English.
- Five years of experience (at least) in education or training For Applicants who have a bachelor’s degree in English.

-  Applicants are required to have a Master's degree in English (Applied linguistics - TESOL - TESL - TEFL - linguistics - English Literature). With at least two years of experience in education or training.
- Holders of a bachelor’s degree in English language can also apply, provided that they obtain a certificate (CELTA), with at least five years of experience in education or training.
